description: Gets information about a FUOTA task.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The arn of a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the new resource.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: Start time of a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: FirmwareUpdateImage
nested_items.description: The S3 URI points to a firmware update image that is to be used with a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: FirmwareUpdateRole
nested_items.description: The firmware update role that is to be used with a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: Created at timestamp for the resource.

nested_items.name: RedundancyPercent
nested_items.description: The percentage of the added fragments that are redundant. For example, if the size of the firmware image file is 100 bytes and the fragment size is 10 bytes, with RedundancyPercent set to 50(%), the final number of encoded fragments is (100 / 10) + (100 / 10 * 50%) = 15.

nested_items.name: FragmentSizeBytes
nested_items.description: The size of each fragment in bytes. This parameter is supported only for FUOTA tasks with multicast groups.

nested_items.name: FragmentIntervalMS
nested_items.description: The interval for sending fragments in milliseconds, rounded to the nearest second.

nested_items.name: Descriptor
nested_items.description: The descriptor is the metadata about the file that is transferred to the device using FUOTA, such as the software version. It is a binary field encoded in base64.
